translation.en: [newsreader on radio] It looks like the storm has passed. New Yorkers, a season high seven inches of rain last night.
translation.fr: La tempête a l'air de s'être calmée. Hier soir 180 mm de pluie sont tombés.

translation.en: High winds and flooding in some areas even left some New Yorkers stranded.
translation.fr: À cause des rafales et des inondations... ...des habitants de New York sont bloqués.

translation.en: City crews still working this morning. They're trying to restore power to several areas in the boroughs.
translation.fr: La municipalité s'affaire à rétablir l'alimentation en électricité.

translation.en: Good news is, today should be sunny with highs in the low 60s.
translation.fr: Aujourd'hui, possibilité de soleil et des températures jusqu'à 15 degrés...

translation.en: [woman] What are you doing, John?
[John] Looking at you. -[woman] Come here. -[panting]
-[soft panting] -[woman] Are you still filming?
[John] Just an anniversary...
[man] It's been a while.
My condolences.
How're you holdin' up?
I keep asking "Why her?"
translation.fr: Je me demande sans arrêt: Pourquoi elle?

translation.en: There's no rhyme or reason to this life.
translation.fr: Cette vie ne connaît pas de logique.

translation.en: It's days like today scattered among the rest.
translation.fr: Il y a ces jours-là parmi les autres.

translation.en: Are you sure? Don't blame yourself.
translation.fr: Tu en es sûr? -Ne pense pas que tu es coupable.

translation.en: What are you really doing here, Marcus?
translation.fr: Que viens-tu vraiment faire ici, Marcus?

translation.en: Just checking up on an old friend.
translation.fr: Voir comment se porte un vieil ami.

translation.en: Goodbye, John.
-[delivery woman] John Wick? -Yes. Sign here, please.
And the pen. Sorry.
-Here you go. Good night. -Thanks.
[Helen] "John, I'm sorry I can't be there for you.
translation.fr: John, je suis désolée de ne pas pouvoir être là pour toi.

translation.en: But you still need something, someone, to love.
translation.fr: Il te faut quelqu'un à aimer. Commence par ceci...

translation.en: So start with this. Because the car doesn't count.
translation.fr: Il te faut quelqu'un à aimer. Commence par ceci... ...car la voiture ne compte pas. Je t'aime, John.

translation.en: I love you, John. This illness has loomed over us for a long time
translation.fr: ...car la voiture ne compte pas. Je t'aime, John. On a été très pris par cette maladie. Maintenant que j'ai trouvé ma paix...

translation.en: and now that I have found my peace, find yours.
translation.fr: On a été très pris par cette maladie. Maintenant que j'ai trouvé ma paix... ...il faut que tu trouves la tienne. À plus. Ta meilleure amie, Helen.

translation.en: -Until that day, your best friend, Helen." -[sobbing]
translation.fr: ...il faut que tu trouves la tienne. À plus. Ta meilleure amie, Helen.

translation.en: [softly] Daisy.
Of course.
Come on.
I'm up. I'm up... -[alarm beeping] -I'm up. I'm up.
Oh. Right.
What?
We'll grab you some kibble later.
translation.fr: J'irai chercher des croquettes plus tard.

translation.en: [man speaking Russian] Do you want anything?
[in Russian] I want your sister.
[in Russian] Kiss my ass, motherfucker!
[in Russian] I just smoke a cigarette. [in Russian] Move your ass, we are late!
translation.fr: Prends-moi des cigarettes. Grouille-toi, on est en retard.

translation.en: [in English] Nice ride.
-[tapping] She a '70? -Sixty-nine.
Beautiful car. Thanks.
-How much? -Excuse me?
How much for the car?
She's not for sale.
Oh, I love dogs.
[in Russian] Every bitch has a price.
[in Russian] Not this one.
[man speaking Russian] Who does he think he is?
translation.fr: Il se prend pour qui, ce type.

translation.en: [in English] You have good day, sir.
How you doing?
You need to go?
[man speaking Russian] Where's the fucking car key?
translation.fr: Où sont les clés de la voiture?

translation.en: [man speaking Russian] Shut up that fucking dog!
[man speaking Russian] Did you find the key?
[in Russian] Here it is.
[in Russian] Rest in peace.
[man speaking Russian] I think I'm gonna keep this mother fucker.
translation.fr: Je garderai cette voiture, je pense.

translation.en: [in English] Yo, Aurelio!
[man] I want a new VIN number and some clean papers.
translation.fr: Je veux un nouveau numéro de série et une carte grise.

translation.en: Where'd you get that car?
Is it here?
It was.
I asked you where the hell did you get it? Who gives a shit?
translation.fr: J'ai demandé comment tu l'avais eue. -Qu'est-ce que ça peut bien te faire?

translation.en: [Aurelio] Iosef Tarasov nicked it.
Viggo's son.
All right, get out of here. Out of my shop. Get out right now. [Iosef] Did you just lose your shit, Aurelio?
translation.fr: Filez. Fichez le camp. -On va faire le malin?

translation.en: Because we own you.
What did you say? What did you say to me? We own you.
You don't own me, punk. I work with your father, all right?
translation.fr: Ben non, gamin. Je bosse avec ton père.

translation.en: The owner of that car, did you kill him or what?
translation.fr: Le propriétaire de cette voiture. Tu l'as tué?

translation.en: No. I sure as hell fucked up his dog. [laughs]
translation.fr: Non. Mais on a zigouillé sa chienne.

translation.en: -Fucked up his dog? That's what you did? -Yeah...
translation.fr: Vous avez zigouillé sa chienne, hein?

translation.en: -Yeah... [laughs] -That's crazy shit, man.
translation.fr: Vous avez zigouillé sa chienne, hein? Bande de malades.

translation.en: -Aw, look at you. That's great. -[tense music playing]
You're gonna come into my shop and you're gonna pull a gun on me.
translation.fr: Sur mon lieu de travail, tu oses pointer une arme sur ma tête.

translation.en: That's great, man. Come on!
translation.fr: Sur mon lieu de travail, tu oses pointer une arme sur ma tête. Vas-y. Tue-moi tout de suite ou fous-moi le camp de mon atelier.

translation.en: Now, either you kill me right now or you get the fuck outta my shop!
translation.fr: Vas-y. Tue-moi tout de suite ou fous-moi le camp de mon atelier.

translation.en: [man] Viggo is not gonna like this.
translation.fr: Ceci ne plaira pas à Viggo.

translation.en: How do you know what Viggo likes or doesn't like? I'll tell you something he's gonna understand.
translation.fr: Comment sais-tu ce qui plaira à Viggo? Je lui expliquerai en détail.

translation.en: You've got a fucking pair on you, old man!
translation.fr: Tu as du culot, vieux con.

translation.en: I guess we'll be taking our business someplace else.
[Aurelio] So what are you gonna do?
I need a ride.
Aurelio speaking.
[Viggo] I heard you struck my son.
-[Aurelio] Yes sir, I did. -And may I ask why?
Yeah. Well, because he stole John Wick's car, sir. And, uh...
translation.fr: Il a volé la caisse de John Wick...

translation.en: killed his dog.
[man] Viggo?
They've agreed to your terms.
translation.fr: Ils sont d'accord avec tes conditions.

translation.en: I mean, it's not like you gave them much of a choice anyway, though, right?
translation.fr: Tu ne leur as pas laissé le choix, non?

translation.en: Congratulations.
Sir?
Have you seen my son?
[man] How was your trip, kid?
We won't be hearing from them anytime soon.
translation.fr: Il ne nous dérangera pas pour le moment.

translation.en: Or ever.
-That's a nice jacket. -[exhales] -Thanks. -Yeah.
-[Viggo speaking Russian] Clean it up! -[gagging]
-Should I go? -[in Russian] No.
-[man] Viggo, English, please. Come on-- -[in English] Stay, God damn it!
[Iosef, with struggled breath] What did I do?
-[Iosef grunts] -[in Russian] You screwed up in full.
[Iosef speaking English] We did what you asked. No one saw shit.
translation.fr: On a fait ce que tu voulais. Personne n'a rien vu.

translation.en: I'm not talking about Atlantic City. -[breathes heavily] -[clink]
translation.fr: Je ne parle pas d'Atlantic City.

translation.en: What, then? You mean Aurelio's? So I stole a fucking car!
translation.fr: De quoi parles-tu alors? Aurelio? J'ai piqué une voiture, et alors?

translation.en: -[grunts] -Aw, fuck, Viggo! -[man] Right, I'll go... -You stay!
It's not what you did, son, that angers me so.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas ce que tu as fait, fiston, qui fait que je suis en colère.

translation.en: -[Viggo] It's who you did it to. -Who? The fucking nobody?
translation.fr: Mais à qui tu l'as fait. -Qui donc? Ce minable?

translation.en: That fucking nobody...
is John Wick.
[Viggo] He once was an associate of ours.
translation.fr: À un moment, il a bossé pour nous.

translation.en: They call him Baba Yaga.
-The Boogeyman? -Well, John wasn't exactly The Boogeyman.
translation.fr: Le croquemitaine? -John n'était pas exactement ça.

translation.en: He was the one you sent to kill the fucking Boogeyman.
translation.fr: Tu l'envoyais, lui, tuer le croquemitaine.

translation.en: [Viggo] John is a man of focus,
commitment...
sheer will.
Something you know very little about.
translation.fr: Ce que toi, tu n'es pas.

translation.en: I once saw him kill three men in a bar...
translation.fr: Je l'ai vu tuer trois hommes dans un bar.

translation.en: with a pencil.
With a fucking...
...pencil.
Then suddenly one day, he asked to leave.
translation.fr: Mais un beau jour il a raccroché.

translation.en: It's over a woman, of course.
translation.fr: À cause d'une femme, bien sûr.

translation.en: [Viggo] So I made a deal with him.
translation.fr: J'ai conclu un marché avec lui.

translation.en: I gave him an impossible task.
translation.fr: Je lui ai donné une mission impossible.

translation.en: A job no one could have pulled off.
translation.fr: Un job que personne ne pouvait réussir.

translation.en: The bodies he buried that day...
translation.fr: Les corps qu'il a enterrés ce jour-là...

translation.en: laid the foundation of what we are now.
translation.fr: ...furent la fondation de ce qu'on est là.

translation.en: And then, my son... a few days after his wife died...
translation.fr: Et puis, mon fils, peu de jours après la mort de sa femme...

translation.en: you steal his car...
and kill his fucking dog.
Father, I can make this right. Oh...
translation.fr: Père, je peux réparer. -Ah bon? Comment donc?

translation.en: -How do you plan that? -By finishing what I started.
translation.fr: Père, je peux réparer. -Ah bon? Comment donc? En finissant ce que j'ai commencé. -Visiblement, il ne m'a pas compris.

translation.en: What the-- Did he hear a fucking word I said?
translation.fr: En finissant ce que j'ai commencé. -Visiblement, il ne m'a pas compris.

translation.en: [in Russian] Father, I'll fix everything, please!
[in English] Iosef! Iosef! Listen!
translation.fr: Papa, je peux le faire. Iosef. Écoute.

translation.en: [Viggo] John will come for you.
translation.fr: John va s'en prendre à toi.

translation.en: And you will do nothing, because you can do nothing. So get the fuck out of my sight!
translation.fr: Et tu ne fais rien, car tu ne peux rien. Alors hors de ma vue, toi.

translation.en: [Viggo] Hello, John.
I heard about your wife, and I'm sorry. My condolences.
translation.fr: J'ai appris pour ta femme. Condoléances.

translation.en: It, um, seems to be fate... or happenstance, or just bad fucking luck
translation.fr: Cela semble prédestiné, le hasard ou bêtement la malchance...

translation.en: caused our paths to cross once again.
translation.fr: ...que nos chemins se croisent à nouveau.

translation.en: John?
Let us not resort to our baser instincts
and handle this like civilized men, to move on--
translation.fr: Réglons ceci en tant qu'hommes civilisés...

translation.en: [man] What'd he say?
-Enough. -[whispering] Oh, God.
Task your crew.
-[sighs] How many? -How many do you have?
[Viggo singing softly in Russian] ♪ Or the Boogeyman will come for you ♪
♪ Hurry, fall asleep ♪
♪ Or the Boogeyman will come for you ♪
♪ Hurry, fall asleep ♪
♪ From the swamp ♪

translation.en: ♪ He will come ♪
♪ And take the children That don't behave ♪
-[cop] Evening, John. -Evening, Jimmy.
Noise complaint? Noise complaint.
You, uh, working again? No, just sorting some stuff out.
translation.fr: As-tu repris le travail? -Non, j'ai juste un truc à régler.

translation.en: Ah, well...
I'll leave you be, then.
-Good night, John. -Good night, Jimmy.
This is Wick.
Yes, John Wick, that's right. I'd like to make a dinner reservation for 12.
translation.fr: John Wick, en effet. Je voudrais une table pour douze.

translation.en: Good to see you, John. [John] Charlie.
You look good. And here I'd feared you'd left all this behind.
translation.fr: Tu as bonne mine. Je pensais que tu avais abandonné ça.

translation.en: Will I be hearing from you anytime soon?
Goodbye, Charlie.
-Of course he did. -[sinister music playing]
Put a contract on John Wick.

translation.en: -How much? -[Viggo] Two million.
[Viggo speaking Russian indistinctly] Lure the wolf with the hen.
translation.fr: Il faut attirer le loup avec des poules.

translation.en: English, Viggo, please.
translation.fr: En anglais, s'il te plaît, Viggo.

translation.en: Put Iosef in the Red Circle and wait.
translation.fr: Emmène Iosef au Red Circle et attends là-bas.

translation.en: For what? For John Wick, of course.
Thank you.
[Marcus] To what do I owe this visit?
I have a job for you.
And I've got a phone.
[inhales] I want to offer you this face to face... seeing as how you might find it personal.
translation.fr: Je veux te l'offrir directement. C'est assez personnel pour toi.

translation.en: Would you kill John Wick for two million dollars?
translation.fr: Veux-tu tuer John Wick pour deux millions?

translation.en: After all, you were close.
-Is the contract exclusive? -No, it's open.
It's a timely matter, it has to be handled quickly.
Consider it done. [sighs]
Thank you, Marcus. I know I can trust you.
translation.fr: Merci. Je savais pouvoir compter sur toi.

translation.en: Thanks for the drink.
-[man] Room 918. Do enjoy your stay. -Thanks.
Good seeing you again, John. Perkins.
I have you for two nights?
-Depending on business, it may be more. -Of course, sir.
translation.fr: Ce sera probablement plus longtemps. -Très bien, monsieur.

translation.en: So when did the old place get a facelift?
translation.fr: Quand est-ce que ça a été rénové ici?

translation.en: Around four years ago. But I assure you, sir, she really hasn't changed much.
translation.fr: Il y a quatre ans environ. Mais il n'y a pas grand-chose de changé.

translation.en: -Same owner? -Same owner.
Room 818.
[man] And, as always...
translation.fr: Et comme toujours, c'est un plaisir...

translation.en: it is a pleasure having you with us again, Mr. Wick.
translation.fr: Et comme toujours, c'est un plaisir... ...de vous avoir de nouveau comme hôte, M Wick.

translation.en: [Helen] What are you doing, John?
[John] Looking at you.
[Helen] Come here.
Hello, Winston.
Now, as I recall...
weren't you the one tasked to dole out the beatings, not receive them?
translation.fr: ...tu étais celui qui flanquait les gifles et pas qui en recevait.

translation.en: Rusty, I guess. To what do we owe the pleasure?
translation.fr: Je suis encore un peu rouillé. -Qu'est-ce qui me vaut le plaisir?

translation.en: -[Winston] What about him? -I'd like to talk with him.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qu'il a? -Je veux lui parler.

translation.en: A talk, you say.
I'm familiar with the parlance, Jonathan.
I want to ask you this.
translation.fr: Et je veux te demander ceci:

translation.en: Have you returned to the fold?
translation.fr: Es-tu de retour dans le troupeau?

translation.en: Just visiting. [Winston] Have you thought this through?
translation.fr: Je viens juste en visite. -As-tu réfléchi?

translation.en: I mean, chewed down to the bone?
translation.fr: Et je veux dire: très bien réfléchi.

translation.en: You got out once. You dip so much as a pinky back into this pond...
translation.fr: Tu en es déjà sorti une fois. Si tu mets un doigt dans ce marécage...

translation.en: you may well find something reaches out
translation.fr: ...tu trouveras peut-être quelque chose... ...qui t'absorbera de nouveau complètement.

translation.en: and drags you back into its depths.
Where do I find him?
translation.fr: Où est-ce que je peux le trouver?

translation.en: Wick's at The Continental.
Welcome home, John.
We have a contact there who's willing to take him out for us. [man] Yeah?

translation.en: How brazen.
If they're willing to break the rules of Continental, double the bounty.

translation.en: -[soft jazz music playing] -You know the rules.
translation.fr: Tu connais le règlement de la maison.

translation.en: No business can be conducted on these premises lest...
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas régler d'affaires ici... ...sous peine d'une grosse amende.

translation.en: incurring heavy penalties.
Have a drink...
and relax.
For now.
translation.fr: Pour le moment en tout cas.

translation.en: It's personal.
Holy shit! Jonathan!
-Hey, Addy. -My God!
-How long has it been? Four years? -Five and change.
translation.fr: Salut, Addy. -Ça fait longtemps, dis. Quatre ans peut-être? -Cinq.

translation.en: So tell me, how was life on the other side?

translation.en: It was good, Addy. Far better than I deserved.
translation.fr: C'était bien, Addy. Bien mieux que ce que je méritais.

translation.en: -Hey, I'm sorry to hear about your-- -Thanks.
I've never seen you like this.
translation.fr: Je ne t'ai jamais vu comme ça.

translation.en: Like what? Vulnerable.
-I'm retired. -Not if you're drinking here, you're not.

translation.en: -Usual? -Please.
Compliments of the house. Thanks.

[in Russian] Everything is clean.

[in Russian] The balcony is clean.

I want another bottle!
Right fucking now! Go get me a bottle!

Hello, Francis.
Mr. Wick.

Where is Iosef?
Bath house, downstairs.
[in Russian] You stole my car.
You killed my dog.
-[in Russian] Wick is here. -[in Russian] No trouble.

-♪ I'll never break your heart ♪ -[in Russian] You called me? [in Russian] Yes.

John Wick's there. Go get him!

I'm sorry to say that no one's that good.
No. I thought not.
May I suggest a drink, sir? Bourbon, perhaps.
That sounds perfect.

Do you need anything for the pain? -[light music playing] -[ice tinkling]

Hey, John.
-Perkins? -I thought I'd let myself in.
I noticed.
-[grunts] -I never knew Ms. Perkins got out of bed for less than three.

-Little Russia. -[tense music playing] [Perkins] There's a church near Cannon Court.

[man] Do I know you?
I'm thinking so.

Everything all right?

-Motherfucker! -[gun shells clinking] [in Russian] You know who you are attacking?

Let's go to the vault.

Viggo will kill me.
[door slams] -Ladies, out.
[John speaking Russian] Have a good day.
[in English] Honestly, what do you think you're going to do with all of that?
translation.fr: Sois honnête, que vas-tu en faire?

translation.en: -This. -[air hissing]
[man speaking Russian] Go!
-[Harry] Don't worry. -[groans] [Harry] Housekeeping will find you.
translation.fr: Pas de panique. La femme de chambre te trouvera.

translation.en: Treat all your ladies like this? You are no lady. Trust me.
translation.fr: Tu traites toutes les dames comme ça? -Tu n'es pas une dame. Crois-moi.

translation.en: Harry, is it?
How'd you like to earn more than just a gold coin?
You've broken the rules. You've done business on Continental grounds.
translation.fr: Tu as violé le règlement en travaillant au Continental.

translation.en: And management does not take kindly to that sort of behavior.
translation.fr: La direction n'aime pas ce comportement.

translation.en: Fuck management.
translation.fr: La direction peut aller se faire foutre.

translation.en: Don't worry. Housekeeping will find you.
translation.fr: Pas de panique. La femme de chambre te trouvera.

translation.en: [in Russian] Shit!
Ashes to ashes.
Can we recover from this?
Viggo, you know what was in that vault? It was nothing.
[Viggo] Shit!
Come on!
-[in Russian] Cover me! -[man speaking Russian] Move away!
[Viggo] I'll say this, John. They sure as fuck broke the mold with you.
translation.fr: Je vais te dire, John, tu es unique.

translation.en: [Viggo] You always had a certain...
[stammering] audacity about you, you know.
I can say you're still very much the John Wick of old.
translation.fr: Tu es toujours le vieux John Wick.

translation.en: Am I?
People don't change. You know that.
translation.fr: Les gens ne changent pas. Tu le sais.

translation.en: Times, they do.
Do you know what was in that vault?
translation.fr: Sais-tu ce qu'il y avait dans ce coffre?

translation.en: Artwork, cash, not without its worth, but the leverage I had on this city...
translation.fr: De l'art, du fric, pas que ça ne vaut rien... ...mais l'emprise que j'avais sur cette ville...

translation.en: Audio recordings, physical evidence, blackmail, it was fucking priceless!
Priceless!
Yeah. I kind of enjoyed that. [laughs] Yeah, I know you did. Yeah.
translation.fr: Oui, ça m'a bien plu de le faire. -Oui, je sais.

translation.en: -Are you really laughing? -[grunts]
So...
Then you got married, ah? Settled down.
translation.fr: Et puis tu es allé te marier et mener une vie tranquille.

translation.en: How did you manage that anyways? Luck, I guess.
translation.fr: Comment as-tu réussi ça? -J'ai eu de la chance, je pense.

translation.en: Yeah, while you had your wife, I had my son. And believe me, you had a far better deal. You know. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Tu as eu une femme et moi un fils. Ta situation était bien meilleure.

translation.en: And then you left. And the way you got out...
translation.fr: Et puis tu as raccroché. Et tu t'es bercé de l'illusion...

translation.en: lying to yourself that the past held no sway over the future.
translation.fr: Et puis tu as raccroché. Et tu t'es bercé de l'illusion... ...que le passé n'avait pas d'influence sur l'avenir.

translation.en: But in the end...
a lot of us are rewarded for our misdeeds...
translation.fr: ...beaucoup d'entre nous sont payés pour nos crimes.

translation.en: which is why God took your wife...
translation.fr: Et c'est pour ça que Dieu a rappelé ta femme à Lui...

translation.en: and unleashed you upon me.
This life...
follows you.
It clings to you...
infecting everyone who comes close to you.
translation.fr: ...et contamine tout le monde qui ose s'approcher de toi.

translation.en: We are cursed, you and I.
translation.fr: Toi et moi, nous sommes maudits.

translation.en: On that we agree.
Finally, common ground. [chuckles]
-Okay. -Step aside. Give me your son.
translation.fr: Ne t'en mêle pas. Donne-moi ton fils.

translation.en: John Wick.
Baba Yaga.
translation.fr: Baba Yaga. Ce n'était qu'une voiture.

translation.en: It was just a fucking car! Just a fucking dog!
translation.fr: Baba Yaga. Ce n'était qu'une voiture. Ce n'était qu'une chienne. -Pas juste une chienne.

translation.en: Just a dog...
translation.fr: Ce n'était qu'une chienne. -Pas juste une chienne.

translation.en: [John] Viggo?
-Yeah. -When Helen died, I lost everything.
translation.fr: Quand Helen est décédée, j'ai tout perdu.

translation.en: -Until that dog arrived on my doorstep. -[somber music playing] A final gift from my wife.
translation.fr: Jusqu'à ce qu'il y ait cette chienne. Le dernier cadeau de ma femme.

translation.en: In that moment, I received some semblance of hope.
translation.fr: J'ai alors eu un peu d'espoir.

translation.en: An opportunity to grieve unalone.
translation.fr: La possibilité de partager ce deuil.

translation.en: And your son... took that from me!
translation.fr: Mais ton fils me l'a retirée. -Arrête un peu.

translation.en: -Oh, come on... -[John] Stole that from me! Killed that from me!
[John] People keep asking if I'm back. And I haven't really had an answer.
translation.fr: Les gens demandent si je suis de retour. Je n'avais pas de bonne réponse.

translation.en: But now, yeah, I'm thinking I'm back!
translation.fr: Mais là je pense que je suis de retour.

translation.en: -So you can either hand over your son... -[in Russian] Nonsense. or you can die screaming alongside him!
translation.fr: Donc soit tu me donnes ton fils soit tu meurs en criant à ses côtés.

translation.en: Cool it, cool it, cool it, cool it, cool it!
-[screams] -[John] Where is he?
I have your word that if I tell you where he is...
translation.fr: Donc si je te dis où il est tu me laisses partir?

translation.en: -you'll let me walk away? -Pull the contract.
translation.fr: Donc si je te dis où il est tu me laisses partir? Retire le contrat.

translation.en: Done.
He's kept in a safe house. Brooklyn. 434 Wallace Place.
translation.fr: Il est dans un refuge à Brooklyn. 434 Wallace Place.

translation.en: -They know you're coming. -Of course. But it won't matter.
translation.fr: Ils t'attendent. Évidemment. Mais ça ne fait rien.

translation.en: [guard speaking Russian] Position three. -[guard 2 speaks Russian] Check in. -[in Russian] I hear you.
[in Russian over radio] All positions stay ready.
[guard speaking Russian] Position two. Check in.
[in Russian] I'm ready.
Will you stop playing the fucking video game?
translation.fr: Arrête un peu avec ce jeu.

translation.en: [guard speaking Russian] I'm ready.
Status?
[in Russian] Ready.
Will you stop playing that fucking video game?
Get down, get down!
[guard] Come on, come on! Get down, get down!
[Iosef speaking Russian] Fuck you!
[inhales] Make the arrangements.
[John] Thank you.
Our pleasure, sir.
A parting gift. From the management.
translation.fr: Un cadeau d'adieu de la direction.

translation.en: Compensation for last night's unfortunate... incident.
[Marcus] How many times do I have to save your ass?
translation.fr: Combien de fois te sauverai-je la peau?

translation.en: -[John] I appreciate it. -[Marcus] Of course.
-You look terrible. -No, I look retired.
translation.fr: Tu as l'air mal en point. -Non, retraité.

translation.en: Retired? You really believe that?
-You made a new life. -[ship horn blowing]
translation.fr: Tu avais trouvé une nouvelle vie.

translation.en: You'll find your way back to it.
It's time to go home.
translation.fr: Il est temps de rentrer à la maison.

translation.en: Let's get on with this... whatever the fuck this is.
[Viggo] Hello, Marcus.
This is John.
I appreciate you granting my son a swift death.
translation.fr: Merci pour la mort rapide de mon fils.

translation.en: I wouldn't know how to reply to that either.
translation.fr: Je ne saurais pas répondre à ça non plus.

translation.en: Marcus betrayed me.
-You pulled the contract. -[Viggo] And while it was open...
translation.fr: Tu as retiré le contrat. Quand il était encore valable tu as eu assez d'opportunités.

translation.en: you had every chance...
translation.fr: Quand il était encore valable tu as eu assez d'opportunités.

translation.en: every opportunity to kill John Wick.
And if you had done your job... my son would be still alive!
translation.fr: Et si tu avais fait ton boulot mon fils serait encore en vie.

translation.en: And in so doing, he broke the cardinal rule.
translation.fr: Et ainsi tu as enfreint la règle principale.

translation.en: [Viggo] Thank you.
Ms. Perkins.
Why am I not surprised? In for a penny, in for a pound.
translation.fr: Cela ne m'étonne pas du tout. -Quand le vin est tiré, il faut le boire.

translation.en: [Viggo] So, John, I had no choice.
translation.fr: Et donc John, je n'ai pas eu le choix.

translation.en: [Viggo] I always liked you, Marcus. [Viggo] The last of the old guard.
translation.fr: Je t'ai toujours bien aimé, Marcus. Le dernier de la vieille garde.

translation.en: But unlike the others, you go out on my terms.
translation.fr: Mais contrairement aux autres tu meurs comme je le veux.

translation.en: No, my good sir.
I go out on my own. ♪ We're killing strangers ♪
See?
Well played, old friend.
[man] We done, Viggo? We're done.
translation.fr: On en a fini ici? -Tout à fait.

translation.en: Okay. Here. Thank you.
Yeah. Fuel the chopper.
[receptionist] Ms. Perkins, I apologize for calling you at this hour.
translation.fr: Mlle Perkins, désolé de vous appeler à cette heure.

translation.en: Ms. Perkins... your membership to the Continental has been,
translation.fr: Mlle Perkins, votre affiliation au Continental...

translation.en: by thine own hand... revoked.
[Winston] I know what you're thinking, Jonathan. We live by a code.
translation.fr: Je t'entends penser, Jonathan: Nous vivons selon un code.

translation.en: Which is why I'm not the one telling you that a certain helicopter

translation.fr: Alors ce n'est pas grâce à moi si tu sais que le plein d'un hélico est fait... ...quelque part pour une certaine personne.

translation.en: -Have you got my cigarettes? -Yeah, I got your cigarettes.
translation.fr: As-tu mes cigarettes? -Oui, je les ai.

translation.en: [man] Oh, fuck!
Yeah. Super. Come on, let's go. Faster! The helicopter's right down there. Come on! Let's go!
translation.fr: Super. Roule. L'hélico est par là.

translation.en: -Shit! -[laughing] Goddamn, I knew he'd come.
translation.fr: Nom de Dieu. Je savais qu'il viendrait.

translation.en: What's fucking wrong with this guy?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas chez ce type?

translation.en: Somebody give me a gun. Who's got a gun?

translation.fr: C'était bon, ça. -Qui a un flingue?

Viggo, the helicopter's right over there. We have to get over there.

-English, please. -Good luck.
Russian cocksucker.
[Viggo] No more guns, John.
No more bullets.
[John] No more bullets.
Just you and me, John.

translation.en: You and me.
What happened, John? We were professionals. Civilized.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qu'il s'est passé? On était des pros. Civilisés.

translation.en: Do I look civilized to you?
Be seeing you, John.
Yeah. Be seeing you.
[Helen on video] Come on, John. Let's go home.
